frame.name: Prison
frame.definition:
<def-root>This Frame deals with <fen>Penal_institution</fen>s. They are run by an <fen>Operator</fen> and may be intended to hold certain kinds of <fen>Inmates</fen>. <fen>Penal_institution</fen>s may have a special <fen>Name</fen> and their <fen>Location</fen> may also be indicated.
<ex>He's in <fex name="Name">Pelican Bay</fex> <fex name="Operator">state</fex> <t>penitentiary</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Operator
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Frame Element <fen>Operator</fen> marks expressions that indicate which level of government operates the Penal Institution.
<ex>Smithers had to serve time in <fex name="Operator">federal</fex> <t>prison</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Inmates
FE.definition:
<def-root><fen>Inmates</fen> marks expressions that indicate the group of people a Penal Institution is intended to hold.
<ex>Monica served time in the Tennessee <t>Prison</t> <fex name="Inmates">for Women</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Name
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE marks expressions that are the <fen>Name</fen> of a Penal Institution.
<ex>Kolimov visited the <fex name="Name">Willy C. Peterson</fex> State <t>Prison</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE marks expressions that indicate the <fen>Location</fen> of the Penal Institution.
<ex>Carruthers spent three years in <fex name="Location">Fort Pulaski</fex> State <t>Prison</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Security
FE.definition: <def-root>The level of security maintained at the prison. <ex>He was held in a <fex name="Sec">maximum security</fex> <t>Prison</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Penal_institution
FE.definition: <def-root>The locale which serves to confine individuals, generally for the purpose of punishment. This FE is incorporated in each LU in this frame.</def-root>

FE.name: Part
FE.definition:
<def-root>A subpart of the <fen>Penal_institution</fen>.
<ex>You really expect me to run a <t>prison</t> <fex name="Part">with only ten cells</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>This FE is used to describe a salent characteristic of the <fen>Penal_institution</fen> not otherwise specified. <ex>They held him for years in an <fex name="desc">isolated</fex> <t>prison</t>.</ex> </def-root>
